code: import React from'react';import{FaTimes,FaCheckCircle,FaRegCircle}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskItem=_ref=>{let{task,onDelete,onToggle}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task ".concat(task.completed?'complete':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[task.completed?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCheckCircle,{style:{cursor:'pointer',color:'green',marginRight:'10px'},onClick:()=>onToggle(task._id)}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaRegCircle,{style:{cursor:'pointer',color:'gray',marginRight:'10px'},onClick:()=>onToggle(task._id)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"task-text",children:task.text})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaTimes,{style:{color:'red',cursor:'pointer'},onClick:()=>onDelete(task._id)})]});};export default TaskItem;
